name: submariner
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a sailor on a submarine (= a ship that can travel underwater): The Navy had hoped to recruit 130 submariners. Former submariners said that rain or temperature changes can confuse sonar.
More examplesFewer examplesHe joined the Navy and became a submariner.Many of the men attending the memorial service at Norfolk Naval Station were retired submariners.The stranded submariners had hammered out messages on the hull of the sub.
